example.text: Specifically, the Stat5a molecule in which the C-terminus can be remarkably truncated at amino acids 740 or 751 effectively blocked the induction of both CIS and OSM, whereas the C-terminal truncations at amino acids 762 or 773 had no effect on the induction of either gene.

Specifically, the Stat5a molecule in which the C-terminus can be truncated at amino acids 740 or 751 effectively blocked the induction of both CIS and OSM, whereas the C-terminal truncations at amino acids 762 or 773 had no effect on the induction of either gene.

Specifically, the Stat5a molecule in which the C-terminus has been shown to be remarkably truncated at amino acids 740 or 751 effectively blocked the induction of both CIS and OSM, whereas the C-terminal truncations at amino acids 762 or 773 had no effect on the induction of either gene.
